```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(googlesheets)
library(RMySQL)
library(reshape2)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r fetchFromDatabase}
database <- dbConnect(MySQL(), user='root', password='MyNewPass', dbname='senior_project', host='localhost')

dbSendQuery(database, 'SELECT * FROM web_traffic;') #any SQL statement works here!

request <- dbListResults(database)[[1]]

#n = -1 asks the server to send all pending requests
web.traffic.data <- fetch(request,n=-1)
```

This is the page that will be auto updated when new data is added. Here is proof!
